text: M. R. Kandasamy Mudaliar is an Indian politician, Textile merchant and former Member of the Legislative Assembly of Tamil Nadu from Veerapandi constituency as an Indian National Congress candidate in 1957 election. He was born in Sengunthar family in Salem district. ==References== Category:Members of the Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Tamil Nadu
title: M. R. Kandasamy Mudaliar
